ComicInfo.Summary:
Having a Wonderful Crime: A camp initiation goes horribly wrong.
What Haunted Herbert: A psychologist puts Herbert into a trance and makes him think he's gone into the past where he is going to be beheaded.
Escape to Treachery: Pedro has only weeks to live so he decides to assassinate El Presidente.
ComicInfo.Writer: George Kashdan,Murray Boltinoff,Al Case,George Kashdan,Al Case
